resources.string: Hold to popup context menu to modify/delete
You can\'t temporarily disable automatic schedule in FREE version
"Maximum schedule limitation reached. The FREE version has only THREE schedules available."

Using \"Add\" to create new schedule.\\nUsing \"Save\" to save and reschedule.\\n\\nNote: The LCD brightness won\'t be changed if you are using and time\'s up. It will be changed after LCD dims, power save, or unlocked
